color

Module for the color writing, I see no need to comment all

immutable string DEFAULT;
makes all by default

immutable string BOLD;
bold (intensive)

immutable string UNDERLINE;
make underlines

immutable string FLASH;
flash! not works in "terminator"

immutable string REVERSE;
revers colors von->font, font->von

immutable string NOBOLD;
set normal intensity

immutable string NOUNDERLINE;
no underlines)

immutable string NOFLASH;
no flash

immutable string NOREVERSE;
no reverse
